description: This is a Flutter widget class called BoardTile, representing a single tile in a Tic-Tac-Toe game grid. It displays 'X', 'O', or an empty state, and handles tap interactions with animated visual effects.

classes.name: BoardTile
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a single tile in a Tic-Tac-Toe board, displaying marks ('X' or 'O') and handling tap gestures.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget's UI, displaying the mark with styling and handling tap events with animation.
